title: Influence Points possible drain/Charity Fund raiser
body:
Not much to write here, just had a thought.

If you own all champions, all rune pages, and all the important runes, most of you would have a large amount of IP stored up. I know there has been many discussions on how to drain the IP that just lingers. I think it would be a great idea to have a "IP for Charity" day or something along the lines of that. Where players can choose, for the week, to convert IP into money for charity. For example 1000IP = $1 for a certain charity. 
Anyways, just an idea. I hope riot invest in this idea :)!

replies.body:
No one would be against donating, but it's not a sound business choice for Riot, there are 100's of thousands of players on every single server that have IP left over, and that could be anywhere between $50-$100 per person at least (a lot of pros tend to have about $250 worth as an example)

It would make more sense for riot to allow IP to convert into RP because then they aren't just giving out more money than they earn (people can easily earn $1 a day, if they play league a decent amount, if not a $1 every 4-5 days getting first wins of the day) because that is essentially what would happen in this scenario.
I didn't mean for this to be a permanent option, just a one off event, maybe once a year. But, I can see where you're coming from

It would be lovely if it were possible, unfortunately it would have to be something like 10,000 to a dollar or more to actually be a viable business option for Riot, this would mean instantly having between $10-$25 from people with nothing to buy (still a large amount) and probably consistently putting money out, but even this is unfortunately a bit much and probably won't be something riot will do.
